news_header: Colombia's cocaine production has reached record levels, doubling in the past year.
news_text: Colombia, the world's largest cocaine producer, produced 2.6 million kilos of cocaine last year, with significant sales to both the United States and European markets. The UNODC reports a decade-long increase in production, with a 10% rise in the area under cultivation, now comparable to the arable land in Southwest Finland. The increase in production is notably concentrated in areas controlled by the FARC guerrilla organization.
